name: Gold Mine (Sebastien Rey)
description:
Gold Mine is a game i created for the end of my 1st year of my Game Design Degree ! 
(Made with Phaser3)

Here's the Pitch : 
You are a Black Morgan, a bounty hunter who's looking forward to kill Lucky Arthur, the leader of the local gang. You'll have to find your way through the differents obstacles until his den.
The only things you can trust are your lasso and your Remington.
